conditions.label: Special meals to be requested at least 48 hours before departure.
Exchangeable 45 minutes before departure by paying a fee of £40 / 50€ per adult, per leg and difference in price. Non-refundable.
Special meals to be requested at least 48 hours before departure.
Exchangeable and refundable up to 60 days after departure unless ticket has been bought as part of a connecting journey.
